mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student(no, name, gender, phone, id_card, degree, graduation_date, is_college, clazz_id, address, violation_count, violation_score, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{no}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{idCard}, #{degree}, #{graduationDate}, #{isCollege}, #{clazzId}, #{address}, #{violationCount}, #{violationScore}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.no, s.name, s.gender, s.phone, s.id_card AS idCard, s.degree, s.graduation_date AS graduationDate, s.is_college AS isCollege, s.clazz_id AS clazzId, s.address, s.violation_count AS violationCount, s.violation_score AS violationScore, s.create_time AS createTime, s.update_time AS updateTime FROM student s WHERE s.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET no = #{no}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, phone = #{phone}, id_card = #{idCard}, degree = #{degree}, graduation_date = #{graduationDate}, is_college = #{isCollege}, clazz_id = #{clazzId}, address = #{address}, violation_count = #{violationCount}, violation_score = #{violationScore}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
